elements.name: gender_identity
elements.title: What is your current gender identity?

choices.text: Agender / Don’t identify with any gender

elements.otherText: Gender not listed. Prefer to self-describe below:

elements.name: ethnicity
elements.title: Which Race or Ethnicity best describes you?

elements.name: lgbtq_community
elements.title: Do you identify with the LGBTQ+ community?

elements.name: biological_sex_identity
elements.title: My biological sex influences my current gender identity.
elements.description: Please select how much you agree or disagree with the following statement.

elements.name: gender_identity_fluidity
elements.title: Do you perceive your gender identity as fluid/changes over time?

elements.name: gender_expression_outlook
elements.title: My gender expression is reflected by my outlook.
elements.description: The following three questions are meant to investigate the change of gender in terms of identity and expression. Please select how much you agree or disagree with the following statements.

elements.name: explicit_effort_gender_identity
elements.title: I make an explicit effort to express my gender identity facially.
elements.description: The following three questions are meant to investigate the change of gender in terms of identity and expression. Please select how much you agree or disagree with the following statements.

elements.name: gender_expression_reflects_social_norms
elements.title: My gender expression reflects social norms.
elements.description: The following three questions are meant to investigate the change of gender in terms of identity and expression. Please select how much you agree or disagree with the following statements.

elements.name: part_of_experiences_of_misgendering
elements.title: Have you ever been part of experiences of misgendering?

elements.name: misgendering_experience_discomfort
elements.title: How much discomfort did you experience?
elements.description: Rate your experience on a scale from 1 to 10, 1 being ‘No Discomfort’ and 10 being ‘Extreme level of Discomfort’
